channel.title: CVE Feed for gksu-polkit -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gksu-polkit -- all products

item.title: CVE-2011-0703|2024-08-06T21:58:26.088Z -- gksu-polkit -- gksu-polkit
item.description: In gksu-polkit before 0.0.3, the source file for xauth may contain arbitrary commands that may allow an attacker to overtake an administrator X11 session.

item.title: CVE-2012-5617|2024-08-06T21:14:15.905Z -- gksu-polkit -- gksu-polkit
item.description: gksu-polkit: permissive PolicyKit policy configuration file allows privilege escalation
